name: Sail!
description:
Manage a pirate crew and order them to perform various ship maintenance tasks while at sea.

Each pirate has different traits that may aid or hinder them during certain tasks. Which pirate is the most efficient at navigating? Or cooking? Which one is too afraid to climb up the mast? Assign your crew wisely!

The ship maintenance tasks are marked with blinking exclamation points. Hover over each task to get more information on its status.

Controls:

  - Left mouse button - choose a pirate to give orders to and get information about their traits. 

   - Right mouse button - order the pirate to go to the chosen destination. If the pirate is directed to a task and has the required skillset, they will start performing the task.
